website_summaries.verdict: It will probably appeal to you if you prefer minimalistic style and have a tight budget, but keep in mind that it doesn't have a lot of space and isn't as sturdy as its competitors.
pros: It's basic and affordable – the simple design is ideal for small spaces and small to mid-sized TVs
Has contemporary styling that complements most decor
cons: It's somewhat wobbly, and won't accommodate large TVs
Some owners reported receiving models that were more red in color than rich brown as advertised

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I have been furnishing my apartment a piece at a time and this table meant that I could bring my 43” LG into my bedroom. I assembled it under 15-minutes by myself and it’s a pretty sturdy and stable table for the price. I don’t recommend sitting on it but my TV fit perfectly. I’m very pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deitra L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this inexpensive purchase to help tie together my ...
customer_reviews.text: They (bought 2) look way more stylish than I thought based on the pictures. There were a few nicks and scuffs in the wood upon delivery which most were able to be wiped out. I am very pleased with this inexpensive purchase to help tie together my mid century modern theme. And like others said, assembly was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I purchased this for my 55" HDTV, fits perfectly on top, the table was super easy to put together, its sturdy, and holds up to 60 lbs my TV weighs just over 40 lbs, this is a much better TV stand if you don't have small children in the home, because it sits on the low side, but if you don't use it for a large TV its certainly a good buy for whatever you decide to use it for, I'm very happy and satisfied with my purchased
customer_reviews.author: traveler/bakery chef

customer_reviews.title: Affordable elegant set.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set! The color is a little bit more red than I expected but it’s nonetheless elegant. Putting it in a corner with a nice lamp elevates the look for my apartment, even though my apartment unit is budget, lol. The coffee table is similar. A little more red than expected but looks nice. Both corner and coffee table feel relatively sturdy though the corner Table’s bottom wooden panel has once fallen out when moving the table. Otherwise it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: VRM

customer_reviews.title: Love it great price
customer_reviews.text: So far i have had this tv stand for a little over a month now, i live the look of it and it was super easy to assemble..I am really thinking about purcgasing another, I am just not sure where i would put it right now. You know a product is great when you want to buy another for no reason!
customer_reviews.author: krissy-poo

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth the price and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic modern design TV stand. It was easier than addition to put it together. Only 3 or 4 pieces. If you want something very sleek but don't want to break the bank I would get this. Perfect for the son's dorm room at college or the young bachelor's living room. I currently use mine in my bedroom closet to stack sweaters and knits.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Was worried but it turned out great :)
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews, I was really worried that the stand would show up and be damaged but when it arrived it was in perfect condition! I was really happy with how it turned out and it was really easy to assemble. It is able to hold my 50 inch TV on the top shelf and hold both my PS3 and PS4 on the second shelf. Really nice and slim design, looks fantastic in my room. I love love loveeee this product, the company sent me these really cute cards and envelopes as well, the overall design and packaging looked really nice. I really like this company and I wouldn't hesitate to purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed, product was missing screws and poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you paid for. We got the stand for my son's room so we really didn't want to spend too much money. The stand looks nice once we put it together but it took a while because we didn't get enough screws to put it together. It was missing 3 screws. Good thing we found some left over screws from other projects. It doesn't match the stand but it'll do. One side of the stand is not welded/glued (see picture) but it shouldn't be a problem since there are metal slats under the wood that will hopefully keep it together.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Came in Damaged
customer_reviews.text: As much as I like Zinus products for being affordable, this was my first horrible experience with them. I contacted their customer service and requested them to send me an undamaged part. They kept telling me my request was "in process". I have reached out numerous times (in a span of around 3 weeks) only to be ultimately told to just exchange it through Amazon. I mean, I wish they told me the first time I chatted with their customer service instead of making me wait on what's going to happen. Horrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: CJP

customer_reviews.title: Solid stand, has the industrial minimalistic look that’s popular in decor
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t looking for anything like heavy furniture to place a 43” Tv on in my home office. This fit the bill. Took about 15 minutes to assemble with included Allen wrench. I don’t think I’d place anything larger than a 43 on it but may be possible depending on the footprint. Quality is decent, no obvious flaws, but this is not fine furniture, more for budget conscious room decor. Perfect for what it does and minimalistic. I have a 29” sound bar on it in the pic for your reference.
customer_reviews.author: SnowbirdTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: NOT AT ALL TRUE TO COLOR
customer_reviews.text: The color is called "brown". Based on the pictures, this table looks like a deeper cherry wood or a slightly reddish brown. NOPE. It is literally BRIGHT ORANGE. I was so shocked when I unboxed this. What a colossal waste of money. It's cheaply made and some legs came damaged too, but honestly it all pales in comparison to how awful the color looks. I mean it is literally BRIGHT orange. There is nothing even remotely brown about it. Lesson learned, always look at customer photos and don't trust the photos taken by the company.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, solid stand, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I really like this simple TV stand. It only has four pieces put together with eight screws, so it is easy to assemble. The stand does not shake after you screwed all the pieces in. Because the edges of the TV stand are surround by the iron frame, you don't have problem with bad quality wood not being fined thoroughly that hurts your hands. The surfaces of the wooden boards are smooth enough. The only issue with assembly is that you definitely need two persons, because you need one person to hold the broad in-place while the other person puts all four screws in.
customer_reviews.author: Heung Tai

customer_reviews.title: Functional Low-Cost TV Table
customer_reviews.text: Looks super cheap but it was super cheap so there ya go. V v easy to put together. I'm thinking I might be able to swap out the "woodish" panels for something nicer--the black metal frame is quite sturdy and looks good. I have a 50" (40 lbs or so) on it and the edge placed feet that came with the TV just barely fit. It would work better with a center placed TV stand but still seems secure.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed at this product. I already have Zinus bedframe, Zinus mattress, Zinus desk, so I decided to get the TV stand to match everything else... Surprise! It looks nothing like the rest of the collection! It's rather weak and reddish brown instead of the pretty brown the rest of the collection has.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value and surprisingly sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this thing for nearly 4 years, through 6 moves, and packed it up and dove 1800 miles away with it. It’s help up amazingly and looks almost exactly the same as the day it arrives. I LOVE everything Zinus that I’ve purchased so far and this is no exception (I’ve bought 2 mattresses and will likely buy a mattress topper or thin mattress to put on the Queen bed in my rental).
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Ketchum

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, and it's pretty cheap
customer_reviews.text: It seems pretty sturdy, and was easy to put together. The top material is cheap pressboard and it arrived warped. It flexes so far out of shape that you can see the pressboard sides, which makes it look even cheaper. The color is not terribly attractive, but the frame is nice. It's one of those "you get what you pay for" kind of situations. It'll do the job, and I'll probably replace the top with some painted wood when I have time to cut and paint.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Prince

customer_reviews.title: It looks great too, although I wish there was some cable ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently using one of these to hold a gamecube, a sony 7.2 channel receiver, a large-ish center channel and a couple of other small devices. There is no wobble at all, and I don't doubt this could hold up a TV along with all the other stuff. It looks great too, although I wish there was some cable management built in. Good thing I've got plenty of experience managing cables.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Very orange
customer_reviews.text: The table is fairly sturdy, for something this inexpensive. It was very easy to put together.. I think it took longer to rip the packaging on the hardware apart than it did to put together. The condition of the metal border is a little rough, with scratches and dents, but nothing too noticeable. The style is cute, but the "wood" is way more orange than I expected it to be. If you're hoping this will just blend in with the other more natural looking wood in your decor, you may want to try something else, or be prepared to spray paint this thing.
customer_reviews.author: curvyone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent with an easy DIY upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and would look nice with a wide range of décor - college apartment, mid-century modern, arts and crafts. Sturdy frame that easily handles my turntable, bookshelf speakers + subwoofer, records, and a large cactus. My only complaint was that the wood panels were too red for my living room - plus, you can easily tell that they're particle board. I took the panels out without any trouble and had birch plywood with a nice grain cut to match at Home Depot - stained and polyurethaned the birch panels, and now this media stand looks like I paid $300 bucks for it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M

customer_reviews.title: Always impressed with Zinus, great TV stand
customer_reviews.text: Zinus always provides high quality products every time I order. This was assembled in 15 minutes and is very sturdy for my TV. The only complaint I have is the "wood" is slightly more red toned than I was expecting, but this is probably an error on my part not the advertisement. It still matches well in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Molly S.

customer_reviews.title: Simple but great tv stand
customer_reviews.text: Package came intact, nothing damaged. Very easy to put together, but this is a 2 person job. The finish is great. And my 50 inch tv sits on top just right. This was one of the best deals I got on Amazon for the price. Also the little thank you cards that came with the box were an extra bonus. I'll be looking to get more furniture from Zinus :)
customer_reviews.author: Jersey baby

customer_reviews.title: Suffice as a TV media stand.
customer_reviews.text: This TV media stand wont be able to carry the heaviest or largest TVs. This media table is more for holding your consoles or blu-rays. The assemble was quite simple, nothing too complicated. The sturdiness will suffice but is relatively wobbly Has great value for the money and cant be beat for $30.
customer_reviews.author: SynysterDragun

customer_reviews.title: Another ZINUS disappointment
customer_reviews.text: It came defective and it’s a bit wobbly . I’m afraid it won’t hold a 32 inch TV. Looks very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: P.

customer_reviews.title: Not As Tall As Pictured
customer_reviews.text: This stand arrived quickly, and thankfully without any scratches or damage. Took about 15 minutes to assemble, would have been less but building solo and with how the sides are to be built, makes it a bit awkward to hold in place. The panels also fall off, as they're not built into the support. My biggest gripe is the stand isn't as tall as I hoped. I still like the look of it, and its pretty sturdy, but I'll be adding a stand/raiser with it so I can actually see my TV at eye level.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stand
customer_reviews.text: We bought this stand to put our Grandaughter’s Ginea pig cage on top of it worked out great !! Hubby said it was very easy to assemble!! Cage fit perfect on top of it !! Then my daughter went toWalmart to get collapsible bins for all of Daisy‘s stuff !! It really worked out well !!
customer_reviews.author: Jo  from NJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice deep shelves and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Was able to get this stand on a great deal/special. I actually needed this stand for a product display stand. Took less then 5 minutes to assemble and now I have about 40 products on stand for display for sale. 2 shelves that are deep for multiple products to be held. I will most likely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Darian Fal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Reliable TV Console
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheap, reliable TV stand for my TV and gaming consoles. Very easy to assemble! I assembled it 2 weeks after I had shoulder surgery and was able to do it with one arm. I have a 58" television and it fits on here with no issues. I've owned it for about 6 months now and haven't had retighten any of the bolts that hold it together. Nice, quality product from Zinus.
customer_reviews.author: Montel

customer_reviews.title: Great - it's not an expensive piece of furniture so ...
customer_reviews.text: Great - it's not an expensive piece of furniture so I wasn't expecting anything fancy but it's solid and easy to put together. Perfect for the terrarium we have our bearded dragon in. It's sturdy and the color of wood tone is more a cherry than what is pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's Simply BEAUTIFUL - and It Makes Me Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Literally, so simple to assemble (I did it myself in minutes - and that is usually not my "thing") and every time I walk past it, I smile. It is so lovely and rich, yet simple and contemporary, it's difficult to describe why, but it definitely makes me smile. Plus the company is a hoot - they sent a thank you note with three "Hello There" and "Thank You" cards for me to use to send to someone (I already used one)... Just a truly nice experience! Thanks, Zinus (and Amazon)!
customer_reviews.author: Jennei Preston

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I like this little TV stand. It's sturdy, I have a 40" TV on top and books on the second shelf. It's also easy to put together and comes with all the tools you'll need. The price is great so I'm not sure there's anything else to say........Oh yeah, it looks good. :D
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Conti

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with damage and in the wrong color.
customer_reviews.text: The table itself is what was expected and as described, except in the wrong color and with damage.
customer_reviews.author: Aech.Gee.Em

customer_reviews.title: The color is redder than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Zinus is a great company and you get the most out of your money, this lil thing is sturdy and looks great. I took off a star because it's a bit more reddish than the picture shows, and therefore doesn't match well the rest of my furniture, however overall worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Berges

customer_reviews.title: STURDY,BEAUTIFUL AND SMPLE!
customer_reviews.text: I love these zinus tables. they are so sharp and sophisticated looking without costing a lot of money and they are so EASY to put together. I am not a handy man and dont even own a tool box, yet these are so simple to put together took me 15 minutes. probably only takes less than 10 if i had a second pair of hands. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great, but not too bad either
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest build when it comes to quality. They are easy to build, but it comes with many defects like the plastic mesh on the legs were uneven and one was pushed inside the leg. The wood isn’t attached to outter frame of the shelve. It feels very brittle and it’s much shorter that I thought (guess that’s what happens when you buy something you can see in person). It does the job though.
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably sturdy for the low price!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how cheap the price is for what you get!! It's so nice to find a truly good deal like this little table! It is rock solid once assembled. I'm honestly impressed and super pleased! My TV is 42 inches and it sits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G

customer_reviews.title: Does the deed!
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to assemble. The color of the base is much more red than I thought....
customer_reviews.author: S. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Can always trust zinus for great products
customer_reviews.text: I have MANY Zinus Products (mattress, desks, etc.) and have never been disappointed. sturdy and simple media table. The wood color was more orange than expected but it works for now. Our 50” Samsung TV fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Really easy to put together and fits in well with my decor. Like the fact that if I move I could easily dissemble to create more space. There was minor damage...be careful removing the packaging
customer_reviews.author: O. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful once I realized how to put it together lol. Shouldn’t have been complicated but there’s no instructions. Works perfect with a 39 inch but my other tv which is 50” hung off the sides
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Decent table to put your flatscreen on
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad in assembly time. Pretty sturdy to keep your flat screen on. Edges are metal so it's a bit sharp so just...dont run into the table and you're good. Kinda wish there was more of a coffee table in this style to match but this table is a bit too skinny to act as a coffee table imo.
customer_reviews.author: The Geminos

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This table was a bit tricky to put together, however I was able to do it without help in about 20 minutes. It looks more expensive than it is and my 32 inch smart tv looks very nice on the top tier, with room for plants, dvd player, etc on the bottom tier. I'm happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: vmurphy03

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend as a TV stand, sit entirely too low,
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the item for my new Tv, unfortunately for me I tossed the box and before I had a chance to watch the television. My sister put the stand together and did not inform me that the stand is entirely too low for a television stand. Had I known it would have went back. I will have to buy a new stand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: My mom and I both needed a new tv stand. The price was right for these. We even put them together .... together. It was fun, and the process was very simple. The product is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Pheiffer

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product, Looks extremely fragile, I put my TV and a few more things and it bent. it came damaged as shown in the picture, I DO NOT recommend this product. That's horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Avelino

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: This is really a beautiful and sturdy TV stand. I can't believe it was so inexpensive. The best part was the ease of assembly. Only had an allen wrench and a handful of bolts all the same size. Was very simple and easy. No wobble, very strong, and has a nice modern look.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Clean, Simple, Great
customer_reviews.text: Most reviews talk about how unstable it is until you add the shelf, and they are correct. I was only looking for a simple table and this fit my price so we'll, but I received a product I was really not expecting to be this good. If you want a simple, clean looking table, that is sturdy and doesn't take up much space, you can't go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Pritt

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Worth it had for a several months I spray painted it black to match the room better. Brought it with me when I moved to my apartment and it’s still sturdy and holding up my 50 inch tv!
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice

customer_reviews.title: TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a 42" TV stand and it is a great fit. I assembled it by myself in about 10 minutes. It's sturdy, attractive, and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: zoe

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this months ago and it has held up very well. It's much sturdier than it looks. I have a heavyish tv on the top shelf and several consoles on the bottom. Have not had any issue.
customer_reviews.author: harley

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: Once this arrived at my apartment I wasn’t sure about it. The box weighted a ton! A lady friend of mine assembled it quickly while I was busy doing something else. Easy!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a good find for the price. The color is off—looks much redder in person. It is easy to assemble but the dimensions are off so be careful if you’re in a ~2 inch range for what you’re holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Rakia

customer_reviews.title: The wood plates are separated from their frames, but sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I didn't expect the wood plates are separated, but they're tight and hard and i can tell they're definitely well fabricated. Perfectly fits my 43 inch LG TV on it. Height level is just right for any normal sitting positions.
customer_reviews.author: Chengyao Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this table to use under our TV for a cable box. For the price it does the job was easy to put together and we are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Assembled its frame was bent, connective rods were very thin. Particle boards were far too thin to accommodates the weight they claim it will hold, no way was I risking my tv on a board I could have broken by hand
customer_reviews.author: Ryan albright

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and pretty goooood
customer_reviews.text: A little bit smaller than I expected but it is my bad that I did not check the exact size. However, it is very easy to assemble and well presented considering it is pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: JunMyung Song

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and strong TV stand.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and strong stand. I have a 55” tv and it is performing wonderfully. Set up took about 10 mins. Super easy visual instructions provided.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand but Color
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice stand. Reddish brown color is ugly. Will probably hack stand. Installation was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Lion King Mom

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Exactly what i was looking for. It was on sale when i brought it - from $100 to $39. For $39 this is just great. $100 seems a bit expensive to me. Wait for the next sale.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Morales

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from Zinus
customer_reviews.text: Another win from purchasing a Zinus product. The box contains everything you need to set up the stand. Overall it took me about 10-15 minutes to set everything up. It is sturdy, stylish and the perfect size for me 40" TV. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: BrittR

customer_reviews.title: Good not great.
customer_reviews.text: It looks kinda cheap, but it is, so that’s expected. It’s a little low to the ground to place the TV on top of it, so I ended up buying a new one from target. It’s still good storage though, so I’m keeping it for my study.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Richards

customer_reviews.title: Did exactly what the photo shows!
customer_reviews.text: Placed under master TV and it looks great. The wood seems a little darker than in the photos which I don't really mind.
customer_reviews.author: WannabeAmazonReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but mismatched finishes
customer_reviews.text: While it is sturdy and looks great, I bought this in the combo with the nightstand and selected espresso as my color choice. They send you an espresso nightstand with the reddish, brown wood for the TV stand and they don’t match, whatsoever. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Easy peezee. Used for storage shelf.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't make it to living room but used as storage in home office for moto gear. See pic. Nice build for 40 bucks. Eight bolts. Good steel. Great work Zinus !
customer_reviews.author: Joshua P. - California

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a TV stand! Very easy to put together, but with very cheap materials. The metal base had several scratches when it arrived, and the “wood” shelves look and feel very cheap. The color is less like a warm brown and more red in tone, and it looks very cheap. It barely fits my 50” TV, so if you’re using it to hold a TV (not wall mounting) then beware of size. Overall, it does what it needs to do, and for the price it definitely could be worse.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something good and not expensive in the same time. this table is made of metal and light boards surface. it is very light wight hold my 40' TV very well. It is not fancy or something I would keep it forever. very easy assembling.
customer_reviews.author: layla

customer_reviews.title: I love it great table great price
customer_reviews.text: I write tough reviews on products that suck but this table doesn't suck actually I love it and I will be buying a couple more they are nothing fancy but they sure as hell work and look good doing it
customer_reviews.author: John O

customer_reviews.title: Overall good, but perfect height to catch toes/feet/ankles/shins/knees
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing for my tv and all my bedside stuff, but let me tell you - the metal parts are hard on my feet and legs, and I have broken several toenails from catching or smashing my feet into it. If you have big feet/clumsy/short legs, be careful.
customer_reviews.author: O truant Muse

customer_reviews.title: its a coffee table
customer_reviews.text: i ordered a coffee table and a "tv media stand" and they are the same thing good as coffee table not so much as a tv media stand
customer_reviews.author: Hernan J. Aponte Malave

customer_reviews.title: Great TV stand
customer_reviews.text: Tried to find something for my 50in TV saw this, thought it would be perfect. It is, but I read the dimensions wrong. Read and measure where and how you want your TV to look before purchasing otherwise, you'll make mistakes like me.
customer_reviews.author: Ralpho

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving photos. The wood is bright orange-red.
customer_reviews.text: Should have looked closely at the other reviews. :( The wood is an appalling, bright orange-red vs. the color in the photo, which is more of a neutral brown. Besides that, seems alright for the price. Feels sturdy enough to hold a big TV.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: It's a good tv stand for the price. It seems pretty sturdy, I have my 55 inch on it. It was easy to put together. I gave it 4 stars because one of the bottom legs was a little dinged up but not that noticeable. Overall I'm satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. This is the second product in this line that I have purchased, and both items were super easy to put together. I put this one together in less than 10 minutes. I like the simple minimalist look since I didn't want any heavy furniture. Looks good and well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst thing bought in amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst thing to order the size is laughable and doesn’t match the picture at all and when u try to return it ups never comes forcing you to keep it ive been impressed with sinus items till now don’t waste your money if your tv is bigger than 40 inches
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Appiah

customer_reviews.title: weird instructions but great product
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were annoying but it was simple enough to figure out. I love how this looks in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hall

customer_reviews.title: kind of orange
customer_reviews.text: it's okay but its pretty small and kind of orange-brown rather than brown
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Modern
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. I luv the modern look of the furniture. Luv the color of the stand. I bought another product from this same company after buying this tv stand. This company makes good products.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W.

customer_reviews.title: Easily fits 43 in tv.
customer_reviews.text: It's a braced frame with two slabs of very thin wood. The metal is that stuff you find in cheap desks, but it's sturdy enough for my 43 in tv and small form factor computer.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect much at this price point. However, the stand was easy to put together and sturdy. Looks exactly as portrayed. I was looking for an inexpensive table for my 50” TV until I decide where to “hang” it on the wall. This fit the bill nicely.
customer_reviews.author: debs

customer_reviews.title: Far more sturdy than expected
customer_reviews.text: Far more sturdy than expected. The compressed wood is heavy and has a thick laminate, and since the main structure of the table is metal it will last very long. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Marrast

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: On a budget I ordered this with suspect for the price but its totally worth it for a good looking, functional and plenty sturdy for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: DMAdam47

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, easy to assemble and feels pretty strong considering how lightweight it is. I have a 65" Samsung on it and it's solid, overall a very good table for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kurz

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, the price is awesome and took me like ten minutes to put together. Honestly very surprised. it is very light and doesn't feel expensive but from afar it looks like it could be. Definitely pay attention to the dimensions though, I thought my 49 inch would fit but it does not. Which is fine ill just use it for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great for DIY-ers
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. The faux wood separates from the metal so my wife was able to customize it with contact paper. Once she finished with the contact paper it popped right back in perfectly. Great buy for the price. Would Recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: christopher dion lynch

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand for my living room
customer_reviews.text: It only took me 10 min to resemble it, no extra tool required. The only thing is it wasnt fit my 55" TV because the stands was on both side. So I have to put it oblique because I doesn't bother to return. Thus, if you have a TV with stands on both side, reconsider it, but if the stand is in the middle like Samsung, it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to assemble . Looks good. The wood is a little more reddish than what it shows into the picture. Other than that no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Brian stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several of these media stands and found that they are very cheap looking. Not easy to put together and they should have had better instructions. If I was not outside of the 30 day return period I would send them back honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: I use this table for my home entertainment system and it looks great. Easy to assemble and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price - don't put anything heavy on it
customer_reviews.text: I ended up lining the shelves with contact paper to make them look like nice expensive wood. I like the result. I wouldn't put anything heavy on it tho. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Helmi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with lots of storage room
customer_reviews.text: Great value. The fake wood color is a little too red for my taste so I’ll probably paint it but this works great and has quite a bit of storage room underneath
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Painted black and it's gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't like the red, so I painted it black with lacquer spray paint. It's gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.author: Forpeace4Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly! Great looking TV stand and extremely easy to assemble. Extremely sturdy and durable. Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: T's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: good product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: its a little smaller than I pictured, but I guess thats my fault for not taking exact measurements, the only problem was the board came a little messed up out of the packaging, a corner piece of the finish had fallen off of the wood, as well as the bottom of the board (but no worries there, as its not visible, overall though I think its good
customer_reviews.author: Will H

customer_reviews.title: Love this company and their products
customer_reviews.text: Like the title says, I really just love this company. They make fantastic budget-friendly furniture that is easy to assemble. My only complaint with this piece is that the brown color is really more of a red.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking TV stand!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great affordable TV stand! It fits our 43" TV very well, it seems sturdy, and it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: sunnytama

customer_reviews.title: Nice tv stand
customer_reviews.text: this was very easy to assemble, I did it myself in about 10 minutes. I would assemble it while it’s laying on its side if you’re by yourself bc the shelves are quite heavy to hold. It’s holding our 42” tv well, it’s not wobbly at all. It was a perfect cheap tv stand for our apartment. There was a little bit of wood scratched off on one of the corners, but we put that side nearest to the wall so it’s not noticeable. It really is only noticeable if you look for it. It came packaged neatly and we are really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Anli

customer_reviews.title: Great piece to own
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Very sturdy. I put vinyl over the wood to make it match my decor. Easy to disassemble and move if needed
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: If only some other products were as good as this one
customer_reviews.text: Went together in a breeze and is exactly as advertised. My 65" Samsung curved TV is now sitting on it, with the cable box underneath on the shelf. If only some other products were as good as this one, I would never have a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: G. David Thayer

customer_reviews.title: Wood has a far redder tint
customer_reviews.text: Regret throwing the box away before assembly. Wood has a far redder tint than what's pictured. Will not be using this now.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Henggeler

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking table
customer_reviews.text: Great little coffee table for my reading room. Easy to put together. I hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Kanav

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: Zinus Garrison Modern Studio Collection TV Media Stand / Table is an easy to assemble stand. The TV stand is not only sturdy, but could also double as a coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Shariyka Romero

product_meta.title: Zinus Modern Studio Collection TV Media Stand / Table / Good Design Award Winner
product_meta.description: Style Name:Media Stand Only| Color:BrownThe Zinus Modern Studio Collection is an ideal combination of function and style. The TV Media Stand/ Table is functional for many purposes in your main living space. At 40 inches long it can accommodate a larger TV and includes an additional lower shelf for accessory and gaming storage. The sturdy, black square steel tubing and high density panel with red mahogany wood grain finish will add an elegant touch to any décor. Easy to assemble. Worry free limited 1 year warranty.
feature_bullets: Functional and stylish with additional lower shelf
Dimensions: 40 x 17 x 18 Inches (LxWxH) with 100 pounds weight capacity
Sturdy, strong square steel tubing frame
Red mahogany wood grain finish is easy to clean

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,337 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
